Here's the ideas for High Priest

It's a promotion of a cleric.

attacks:

1)heal/mystic mace
2)wide area heal (heal characters over a greater area)/greater heal 
(increase health points beyond norms for the character)
3)shout curses (freeze opponents in place, etc)
4)resurrect/reincarinate (bring dead corpses back to life as a random 
character class)
